sentences.sentence: All material modifications will apply prospectively only.
sentences.translation: 所有重要的修改都不溯及既往。

sentences.sentence: The best way to research it is, prospectively, off billing data.
sentences.translation: 研究这一问题的最佳方法可能是与账单资料脱勾。

sentences.sentence: Clinical, radiological and microbiological data were collected prospectively.
sentences.translation: 前瞻性地收集了临床、影像和微生物学数据。
